Member Function Documentation

void MCAPIHighlighter::setStyle ( StyleType  type,
HighlightStyleDesc const &  styleDesc 
)

Sets the highlight style as a global style for all MCAPI highlighters.

Parameters:
[in] type The style to set.
[in] styleDesc The style description.
Remarks:
The styles must be taken into use by calling applyStyles().
